variables.name: STATE_INVALID
variables.comment:
* Invalid state.
     *
     * Used for returning error codes.

variables.name: STATE_OFF
variables.comment:
* OFF state.
     *
     * Denotes a general OFF state. Applies to all settings.

variables.name: STATE_SINGLE_TRACK
variables.comment:
* Single track repeat.
     *
     * Applies only to {@link SETTING_REPEAT}.

variables.name: STATE_ALL_TRACK
variables.comment:
* All track repeat/shuffle.
     *
     * Applies to {@link #SETTING_REPEAT}, {@link #SETTING_SHUFFLE} and {@link #SETTING_SCAN}.

variables.name: mSettingsValue
variables.comment: * Hash map of current capability values.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel out, int flags)
public int getSettings()
methods.comment:
* Get the supported settings.
     *
     * @return int ORed value of supported settings.

methods.name: public void addSettingValue(int setting, int value)
methods.comment:
* Add a setting value.
     *
     * The setting must be part of possible settings in {@link getSettings()}.
     *
     * @param setting setting config.
     * @param value value for the setting.
     * @throws IllegalStateException if the setting is not supported.

methods.name: public int getSettingValue(int setting)
methods.comment:
* Get a setting value.
     *
     * The setting must be part of possible settings in {@link getSettings()}.
     *
     * @param setting setting config.
     * @return value value for the setting.
     * @throws IllegalStateException if the setting is not supported.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel out, int flags)
public void addSettingValue(int setting, int value)
